text:
Microsoft is officially joining the local LLM trend with Foundry Local. more or less the same as ollama or LM studio
now you finally have a solid business reason to ask for a better laptop :)

#LLMs #AI #opensource 

https://
github.com/microsoft/Foun
dry-Local
…

.
@essential_ai
's rnj-1 model is now on Ollama!

ollama run rnj-1 

8B parameter, open-weight dense model trained from scratch. The model is optimized for code and STEM with capabilities on par with other state of the art open-weight models. 

Let's go!

GUI for batch processing text files with Ollama


https://
github.com/hclivess/ollam
a-batch-processor/
…

Using the same technique as running Phoenix on Android, I managed to get Ollama + Gemma3 running too lol

Messing around with local LLMs is getting so much more fun, huh?
Is there any documentation available that specifies the exact usage limits?

Olmo 3.1 and 3 from 
@allen_ai
 models are available on Ollama. 

7B Instruct: 
ollama run olmo-3:7b-instruct

7B Think: 
ollama run olmo-3:7b-think 

32B Instruct: 
ollama run olmo-3.1:32b-instruct

32B Think: 
ollama run olmo-3.1:32b-think
